alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; North Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 7:41PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL CASS AND NORTHEASTERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Emily, or 26 miles north of Brainerd, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Emily around 800 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Outing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
